sentence: Among those being subpoenaed are Kelli Ward, the Arizona GOP chair who has already filed suit to block the committee from getting her phone records, and Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano, an outspoken purveyor of the false claim that there was widespread fraud in the presidential election.
title: New subpoenas from Jan. 6 committee target 'alternate elector' organizers

sentence: The latest bevy of subpoenas includes those sent to Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem, two Trump allies who the committee says boosted efforts to send alternate electors who would vote for Trump.
author: Virginia Aabram
title: 'False electors' targeted in new round of Jan. 6 committee subpoenas

sentence: In the battle for the Republican gubernatorial nomination, meanwhile, former Rep. Lou Barletta has a 17-14 edge over state Sen. Doug Mastriano, with all others in single digits.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 3/4

sentence: Four candidates receive double-digit support: Lou Barletta (19%), Doug Mastriano (18%), Dave White (14%), and Bill McSwain (11%).
author: Dana Blanton
title: Fox News Poll: McCormick tops Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania GOP senate primary poll

sentence: GOP candidates who campaigned with these hate groups include Lou Barletta, Doug Mastriano, Dave White, Bill McSwain and Guy Ciarrocchi.
title: Josh Shapiro (D) Makes The Case Why PA GOP Deserve The Blame For Price Gouging At The Pump

sentence: Recent polls show the Republican primary race as very much a two-man battle between himself and State Sen. Doug Mastriano.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Exclusive  Gubernatorial Candidate Lou Barletta: Illegal Immigration Ends When Im Governor of Pennsylvania
